citations.narrative:
A SUITABLE METHOD SHALL BE PROVIDED FOR RAPIDLY ELIMINATING EXCESS WATER. ONE
ENCLOSURE HOUSING A CARACAL HAS A FLOOR OF MUD. A METHOD SHALL BE PROVIDED TO
ELIMINATE MUD AND STANDING WATER WITHIN THE ENCLOSURE.
CORRECT BY: JUNE 10, 2014
THIS ROUTINE INSPECTION AND EXIT BRIEFING WAS CONDUCTED WITH THE LICENSEE.
END OF REPORT.
Additional Inspectors
Howard Tami, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
